summary: Feature request to expose NativeClient keep-alive options that are already enabled by default in SDK core. The request was closed as the team determined that long polls used by the worker are a suitable replacement for keep-alive functionality.
userImpact: Users requesting keep-alive support for NativeClient connections would not have direct access to this feature.
rootCause: Long polls in the worker provide equivalent functionality to keep-alive, making the feature request unnecessary.
proposedFix: Expose keep-alive options from sdk-core issue #585 (though ultimately not implemented).
workaround: Use long polling mechanism already available in the worker.
resolutionDetails: Team determined that long polls used by workers are a sufficient replacement for keep-alive support, so the feature was not implemented.
keyQuote: This doesn't apply to the worker imho as the long polls are a replacement for keep alive.
